title: Understanding the Basics of Web Development
des: HTML structures content on the web, while CSS styles it for visual appeal. Together, they form the foundation of every modern website’s design and layout.

title: Getting Started with ASP.NET Core
des: Web APIs allow communication between different software systems, enabling applications to send, receive, and process data over the internet using protocols like REST or GraphQL.

title: Mastering React for Modern UI Development

title: Building a RESTful API with Node.js
des: Responsive web design ensures websites look great on all devices by adapting layouts, images, and content fluidly, improving usability and accessibility across screen sizes.

title: Deploying Applications on Vercel and Netlify
des: JavaScript adds interactivity to websites, enabling dynamic content, animations, and responsive behavior. It’s essential for building user-friendly, interactive, and real-time web applications.
